text: The earth is but one country, and mankind its citizens.
source: Gleanings From the Writings of Bahá’u’lláh
author: Bahá’u’lláh

text: So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth.
source: Gleanings From the Writings of Bahá’u’lláh
author: Bahá’u’lláh

text: Let your heart burn with loving kindness for all who may cross your path.
author: ‘Abdu’l-Bahá

text: O SON OF SPIRIT! My first counsel is this: Possess a pure, kindly and radiant heart, that thine may be a sovereignty ancient, imperishable and everlasting.
author: Bahá’u’lláh
